name: Email Collection
description: Collection of email addresses from online forms and customer signup

name: Purchase Recording
description: Recording consumer purchase transactions and payment information

name: Marketing Use
description: Using consumer email and purchase history for targeted marketing campaigns

name: Data Retention
description: Storing consumer personal information for 3-year retention period

name: Third-Party Disclosure
description: Disclosing consumer data to third-party analytics and marketing partners

name: Behavioral Advertising
description: Sharing consumer browsing history with advertising networks for cross-context behavioral advertising

name: Sale of Data
description: Selling aggregated consumer purchasing data to data brokers

name: Data Deletion
description: Deleting consumer personal information upon request or expiration of retention period

name: Profiling Inferences
description: Creating behavioral inferences from consumer transaction history
